attributes.action: reduce congestion charges and road tax! Instead, make public transport cheaper, cleaner and more accessible!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All of us would rather be more environmentally friendly. If public transport were cheaper, cleaner, and more reliable, we would ALL leave our cars at home! It is almost unaffordable to use a car, and yet we have not been provided with any alternative! Invest more into public transport, and people will willingly use it!
